snippet: The coach of the United States women's soccer team, Scot Tom Sermanni, was relieved of his duties after a 2-0 victory over China on Sunday, US Soccer has announced....

headline.print_headline: U.S. Sack Women's Coach Sermanni After Victory
headline.main: U.S. Sack Women's Coach Sermanni After Victory

lead_paragraph: The coach of the United States women's soccer team, Scot Tom Sermanni, was relieved of his duties after a 2-0 victory over China on Sunday, US Soccer has announced.
